text:
When deploying a new web application, the Manager app states quite clearly that the Context Path field is 'Optional'.  It is however /required/ and the deployment will fail unless a valid one is provided.  The documentation even states that at a minimum this has to be a single '/' unless specifying the ROOT application.

Furthermore, the very succinct and unhelpful error message mentions nothing regarding this expected format.
creator: anomaly256@gmail.com
anomaly256@gmail.com
text: Correction, the documentation states that it must start with a '/', and that it must be provided unless specifying the ROOT application.  However it still fails unless you specify one, when when you intend to reference the root app

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This was fixed in 6.0.19 onwards.
